titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: STAFF ROLE CARRYING OUT HOLISTIC NEEDS ASSESSMENT - Description

body.p: STAFF ROLE CARRYING OUT HOLISTIC NEEDS ASSESSMENT is the same as attribute STAFF ROLE CARRYING OUT HOLISTIC NEEDS ASSESSMENT OR PERSONALISED CARE AND SUPPORT PLANNING .
STAFF ROLE CARRYING OUT HOLISTIC NEEDS ASSESSMENT is the staff role of the individual carrying out the Holistic Needs Assessment .
